content.p: §398-9 Administration. (a) The director shall have jurisdiction over those prohibited acts made unlawful by this chapter. (b) The department shall assist employers in the placement of temporary help to perform the work of those employees on family leave. (c) The director also may hire, subject to chapter 76, investigators, hearings officers, clerical, stenographic, and other staff as may be necessary to administer and enforce this chapter. [L 1991, c 328, pt of §1; am L 1995, c 154, §7; am L 2000, c 253, §150] Previous Vol07_Ch0346-0398 Next
The director shall have jurisdiction over those prohibited acts made unlawful by this chapter.
The department shall assist employers in the placement of temporary help to perform the work of those employees on family leave.

The director also may hire, subject to chapter 76, investigators, hearings officers, clerical, stenographic, and other staff as may be necessary to administer and enforce this chapter. [L 1991, c 328, pt of §1; am L 1995, c 154, §7; am L 2000, c 253, §150] Previous Vol07_Ch0346-0398 Next
